Title: [Feature Request] Warlock Lifetap
Description: Warlocks do not seem to have Lifetap (Glyph) to be taken into effect (making spirit better weighed for warlocks / spirit items which are clearly better and listed as not as good)
Suggestion: Adding some feature that takes lifetap into effect.
ummm... ya, it's already in there dude, read your spell stuff after doing a search on lifetap

Jothay wrote:

ummm... ya, it's already in there dude, read your spell stuff after doing a search on lifetap

You are correct, it is there but it does not do anything. It does not compete / add up spirit into spell. Yes it is there it just is doing nothing

The Glyph of Lifetap is implemented - take a look at the item DPS values and you will see them change whenever you select (or de-select) the glyph.

I just forgot to show the bonus gained in the tooltip for total 'Spirit', and also for 'Bonus Damage' on the stats tab. /facepalm
